    • findAll

      public List<Beer> findAll()
      Retrieves all beers from the database.
      Specified by:
      findAll in interface BeerDao
      Returns:
      a list of all beers available in the database. If no beers are found, an empty list is returned.

    • findById

      public Beer findById(int id)
      Retrieves a beer from the database by its ID.
      Specified by:
      findById in interface BeerDao
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the beer to retrieve.
      Returns:
      the beer with the specified ID, or null if no such beer exists.

    • findByName

      public List<Beer> findByName(String name)
      Retrieves a list of beers from the database by their name.
      Specified by:
      findByName in interface BeerDao
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the beers to retrieve.
      Returns:
      a list of beers with the specified name, or an empty list if no such beers exist.

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
